file_content.text: Which side did Arcann attack first?
Both. Ships from the Eternal Fleet struck at shipyards and rallying points for both sides simultaneously.
They favored ambush tactics throughout the war. Zakuulan sensor technology has far greater range than our own, and their ships can fly much further on less resources.
Only vessels retrofitted with isotope-5 could manage to outrun them. None could truly compete.
How long did the Republic and the Empire manage to hold out?
Within three months, the bulk of our naval forces were disabled or eliminated, and the Republic was in the same situation.
With naval superiority, Arcann's forces could begin choking off supply lines, trade... any ship travel at all. The Eternal Fleet seemed to be everywhere at once.
Coruscant and Dromund Kaas were blockaded by the end of the first year.
How did it end?
Chancellor Saresh also refused to discuss surrender, but the Republic Senate managed to overrule her. A cadre of Senators negotiated their own cease-fire terms.
All of those Senators have since been disgraced or dismissed. I'm sure you can imagine the likely culprit.
The members of the Dark Council fought Arcann's invasion ruthlessly--and lost. The Empire's treaty was ultimately negotiated by the Minister of Logistics.
What about the Mandalorians?
So far, the treaties with Zakuul have held. But that will not last forever.
I've heard rumors that they are still managing to fight somehow, but I've seen nothing concrete. I wish I could tell you more.
What about the Jedi Order?
I know that they suffered heavy losses, but that's the extent of my information. I've sent agents to find out more, but none have returned.
What about Sith Intelligence?
I wish I had more to tell you.
I'm no longer a part of the organization, but I know that most of its assets were wiped out in the fighting.
From what I've heard, Empress Acina prefers to rely on technological surveillance rather than direct intervention. I'm not sure what, if any, reconstruction has taken place.
When Darth Marr and I faced Valkorion, we knew right away. He was the Sith Emperor, Lana.
I know.... When he was struck down, it released ripples through the Force.
Everyone who had felt the Sith Emperor's presence in the past... on Ziost, on Yavin Four... we all sensed what had happened.
Arcann invaded soon after, claiming that an "Outlander" had assassinated his father, the "Immortal Emperor". It didn't take long for us to unravel the truth.
What about Republic Special Forces? Is Havoc Squad still operational?
I believe so, but they've gone dark--top secret operations only. I haven't been able to determine their current roster, let alone make contact.
What of my power base? Moff Pyron? The Silencers?
Many of the vessels equipped with the Silencers were lost in the initial fighting. The rest disappeared along with Pyron somewhere in the far Outer Rim.
It is presumed that they were ambushed by the Eternal Fleet, but no wreckage has been found. We must carry on without them.
